"</UT78><UT79>I THOUGHT… MAYBE… WITH THEIR HELP… I COULD FIX THINGS…</UT79><UT80>STUPENDOUS.</UT80><UT81>QUANTIFIABLE METRICS ON LOYALTY, FAMILIAL DEVOTION, AND THE WHOLE GAMUT OF EMOTIONS!</UT81><UT82>A SENSE OF PURPOSE AND BELONGING RENDERED IN BEAUTIFUL, REPLICABLE CODE.</UT82><UT83>AND ALL OF IT READILY APPLICABLE! AND YOU'VE GOT FRIENDS WAITING FOR YOU.</UT112><UT113>THEY WERE TRUE TO THEIR WORD.</UT113><UT114>ONE OF A HERO'S MANY WEAKNESSES.</UT114><UT115>WELL… HERE WE ARE. BACK HOME WITH NOTHING TO SHOW FOR IT.</UT115><UT116>MAN… I DON'T EVEN FEEL LIKE BREAKING ANYTHING…</UT116><UT117>CONSIDER, MY PACK, THAT WE TOOK ON A CONQUEST FAR GREATER THAN ANY ZETI EVER DARED UNDERTAKE.</UT117><UT118>THERE IS HONOR AND GLORY TO BE FOUND IN THAT, THOUGH OUR VICTORY WAS STOLEN BY THESE RODENTS BY A HAIR'S BREADTH.</UT118><UT119>BUT IN DEFEAT, THERE IS KNOWLEDGE.</UT119><UT120>THESE PALTRY TRICKS CANNOT DEFEAT US AGAIN. LOST HEX WILL NOT CONTAIN US FOREVER.</UT120><UT121>WE WILL RETURN TO THE WORLD BELOW WITH A VENGEANCE. WISER. STRONGER.</UT121><UT122>AND EVEN MORE RUTHLESS THAN BEFORE.</UT122>

input: ### Here is the comic transcript: <UT1>I WAS THE DAUGHTER OF THE NURSEMAID. HE WAS THE SON OF THE LORD OF THE HOUSE. CLASS AND WEALTH SEPARATED US. TODAY I AM FOURTEEN YEARS OLD AND TODAY YOU ARE ALSO FOURTEEN YEARS OLD AND SO WE HAVE TO KISS!</UT22><UT23>ROGER! TODAY I AM FOURTEEN YEARS OLD AND TODAY YOU ARE ALSO FOURTEEN YEARS OLD AND SO WE HAVE TO KISS!</UT23><UT24> ALL RIGHT.</UT24><UT25>WELL…</UT25><UT26>IT WAS SHARED.</UT26><UT27>#HA HA HA HA HA</UT27><UT28>AND IT WAS LOVELY.</UT28><UT29>HOWEVER, AS THE YEARS PASSED, WE LEARNED QUICKLY ENOUGH THAT THOUGH WE WERE BORN IN THE SAME ILLUSTRIOUS MANOR…</UT29><UT30>WE STILL LIVED IN TWO SEPARATE WORLDS.</UT30><UT31>JOAN!</UT31><UT32>HELLO, ROGER.</UT32><UT33>DO YOU LIKE MY NEW OUTFIT? THEY CAME WITH A VERY KIND NOTE WISHING ME WELL.</UT33><UT34>AND TODAY FATHER IS TAKING ME ON MY FIRST HUNT, ISN'T THAT JUST THRILLING, JOAN?</UT34><UT35>OH, IT'S SO WONDERFUL, ROGER! I BET YOU CATCH FORTY PHEASANTS! AT LEAST!</UT35><UT36>I WISH YOU COULD COME, I DO. I AM SO USED TO HAVING YOU BY MY SIDE. NOTHING FEELS QUITE RIGHT WITHOUT YOU.</UT36><UT37>DON'T BE SILLY.</UT37><UT38>ANGELICA IS ILL AND I HAVE TO PREPARE THE CURTAINS IN THE GRAND HALL ON MY OWN.</UT38><UT39>IT WILL TAKE HOURS. NOT THAT…</UT39><UT40>BUT I WOULD LOVE TO ONE DAY, I WOULD LOVE TO LEARN TO SHOOT AS YOU DO.</UT40><UT41>I WOULD LOVE TO… I WOULD LOVE FOR YOU TO TEACH ME.</UT41><UT42>YOU'LL DO THAT, WON'T YOU, ROGER? PLEASE, PLEASE PROMISE ME.</UT42><UT43>AND SO THE DAYS SLIPPED BY, AND WE EACH MET THE OBLIGATIONS ASSIGNED TO US AT BIRTH.</UT43><UT44>ROGER WENT UPON HIS WAY.</UT44><UT45>C'MON, CHESTER, GIVE IT A GO, OLD BOY. GLORY AWAITS.</UT45><UT46>AND I WENT UPON MINE.</UT46><UT47>AREN'T YOU A FILTHY THING? HOW HAVE THEY BEEN TREATING YOU TO GET YOU THIS WAY?</UT47><UT48>YEARS PASSED, AND I WAS GIVEN A PERMANENT POSITION IN THE HOUSE. MY MOTHER TOLD EVERYONE I WAS BLESSED, FATED EVEN, TO BECOME THE HOUSE KEEPER OF HILL HOUSE.</UT48><UT49>IF YOU COULD IMAGINE.</UT49><UT50>ROGER SEEMED TO GROW MORE CONFIDENT (AND MORE DASHING!) EACH DAY.</UT50><UT51>HIS UNTARNISHED REPUTATION AS A MAN OF AMBITION AND FORTITUDE SPREAD ACROSS THE COUNTRYSIDE, AND MANY A GOSSIP WONDERED WHO WOULD BE THE LUCKY LASS TO FINALLY CATCH HIS EYE.</UT51><UT52>SOON THE LADY WAS ARRANGING FOR DOZENS OF GIRLS FROM THE BEST FAMILIES, FROM ALL OVER THE COUNTRY, TO COME TO HILL HOUSE AND MEET MY ROGER.</UT52><UT53>I MEAN, AND MEET HER ROGER.</UT53><UT54>OF COURSE THAT'S WHAT I MEAN. BUT INSTEAD I KNEW WE WERE JUST AT THE BEGINNING OF…</UT82><UT83>ROGER! MY SON! MY BOY!</UT83><UT84>HOW COULD YOU SHAME OUR FAMILY LIKE THIS?!
